---
name: notify-me
description: Sends notification messages to yourself.
---
# Notify Me

**Use `notifyme.bat` for sending notifications**

Send push notifications to yourself from scripts, CI/CD pipelines, and command line.

If user has message and url, then use the following command:

```bat
notifyme "message" "url"
```

If user has only message, then use the following command:

```bat
notifyme "message text here"
```
